TECHNICAL_SECTION.FORM_LG_LIST: EN CS DA DE ET EL ES FR IT LV LT HR HU MT NL PL PT SK SL FI SV RO GA BG

CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Investment Bank, European Investment Fund, European Bank for Reconstruction and Development
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: BI202

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: EIB - Veřejná zakázka na dodání kompresorových jednotek
BEI - Il-ksib ta’ unitajiet ta’ kompressuri

CONTENTS.P: PJSC “Ukrgasvydobuvannya” (hereinafter referred to as “the Borrower”) applied for a loan from the European Investment Bank — EIB (hereinafter referred to as “the Bank”) — towards the cost of the improvement of sustainability and increase of hydrocarbons production of PJSC “Ukrgasvydobuvannya”. This International Invitation for Tenders relates to the contract for Pasichna Booster Compressor Facility.

The scope of the contract covers the supply, installation supervision, commissioning and testing of 3 (three) complete compressor units with piston compressors and gas piston engines. The nominal capacity of each unit is 175 000 m3/day (at 20 degrees Celsius and 1.013 bara).
This contract is expected to be implemented from 2nd quarter of 2018 to 1st quarter of 2019.
The criteria to be used in the tender evaluation are, in decreasing order of importance are price and payment schedule.
All firms are invited to participate in the tender.
Interested eligible bidders may obtain further information from, and inspect the bidding documents at:
http://ugv.com.ua/uk/tenders/announced
E-mail: tender@ugv.com.ua
A complete set of bidding documents may be obtained on the submission of an application to the above address bearing the name of the project. On request, bidding documents will be sent by e-mail.
A bid security of 2 % of the bid value fulfilling the conditions indicated in the bidding documents must accompany all bids.

All bids must be delivered in closed envelopes bearing the mention “Bid for Pasichna Booster Compressor Facility” not later than 15:00 on 5 March 2018 at the following address: PJSC “Ukrgasvydobuvannya” office, Ukraine, Kyiv, 04053, 26-28 Kudriavska str. . Bids will be opened immediately in the presence of bidders’ representatives who choose to attend.

The criteria to be used in the tender evaluation are, in decreasing order of importance are price and payment schedule.
All firms are invited to participate in the tender.
Interested eligible bidders may obtain further information from, and inspect the bidding documents at:
http://ugv.com.ua/uk/tenders/announced
E-mail: tender@ugv.com.ua
A complete set of bidding documents may be obtained on the submission of an application to the above address bearing the name of the project. On request, bidding documents will be sent by e-mail.
A bid security of 2 % of the bid value fulfilling the conditions indicated in the bidding documents must accompany all bids.

All bids must be delivered in closed envelopes bearing the mention “Bid for Pasichna Booster Compressor Facility” not later than 15:00 on 5 March 2018 at the following address: PJSC “Ukrgasvydobuvannya” office, Ukraine, Kyiv, 04053, 26-28 Kudriavska str. . Bids will be opened immediately in the presence of bidders’ representatives who choose to attend.

PJSC “Ukrgasvydobuvannya” (hereinafter referred to as “the Borrower”) applied for a loan from the European Investment Bank — EIB (hereinafter referred to as “the Bank”) — towards the cost of the improvement of sustainability and increase of hydrocarbons production of PJSC “Ukrgasvydobuvannya”.
